definitions: used to indicate a departure from a literal use of words; metaphorically

examples.text: we left a lot of people literally and figuratively in the dark
I did bump into— figuratively speaking—quite a few interesting people

shortDefinitions: used to indicate departure from literal use of words

definitions: in a style representing forms that are recognizably derived from life

examples.text: Chinese art influenced her to paint figuratively

shortDefinitions: in style representing forms that are recognizably derived from life
